post.text: It's time for Trump to answer serious questions about his ties to Russia. http://slate.me/2dWggCd

comment.author: Jack
comment.text: 1-Donald Trump doesn't work for the gov yet and can use a private server. But your were required use a secure server like you were required to do. and didn't ......2 none of the rest of the garbage you said has no proof but hey your being investigated by the FBI 2 of them 5 in different states

replies.author: Alysha
replies.text: I have a private server, anyone can have a private server, just not using it for government business. That's the difference.

replies.author: Jack
replies.text: Alysha right Hillary is desperate and trying to throw things against the wall and hope it sticks

replies.author: Tracey
replies.text: Exactly !!! He does not deal with classified Gov email..

replies.author: Jack
replies.text: She is just swinging at anything hoping her supporters won't realize that fact

replies.author: Danielle
replies.text: As a party nominee, Trump is being briefed on state secrets, so he has an obligation to keep them. He has an obligation for transparency. Time to show his hand
